downloadTitle: Office Communicator Web Access: Microsoft Office Communicator Web Access Security Guide
downloadDescription: This guide discusses best practices for securing a Microsoft Office Communicator Web Access deployment.
detailsSection:
This guide discusses best practices for securing a Communicator Web Access deployment and points to additional resources for implementing specific solutions.
This guide contains the following sections:

  • Identifying possible security threats to Web server applications and understanding how Communicator Web Access is designed to counteract such threats.

  • Identifying threat controls by creating a defense-in-depth strategy.

  • Implementing controls for potential security threats to your Communicator Web Access deployment.

  • Identifying security best practices for Communicator Web Access.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office applications:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2003
    • Microsoft Word 2002
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the CommunicatorWebAccess_Security.doc to open the document.
To remove this download:

To remove the download file, delete the file CommunicatorWebAccess_Security.doc.
